$comment: OSCAL Control Mapping Model: JSON Schema

json-schema-directive.title: Schema Directive
json-schema-directive.description: A JSON Schema directive to bind a specific schema to its document instance.

oscal-mapping-oscal-mapping:mapping-coll.title: Mapping Collection
oscal-mapping-oscal-mapping:mapping-coll.description: A collection of relationship-based control and/or control statement mappings.

uuid.title: Mapping Collection Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A globally unique identifier with cross-instance scope for this catalog instance. This UUID should be changed when this document is revised.

oscal-mapping-oscal-mapping:mapping.title: Control Mapping
oscal-mapping-oscal-mapping:mapping.description: A mapping between two target resources.

uuid.title: Mapping Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A machine-oriented, globally unique identifier with cross-instance scope that can be used to reference this mapping definition elsewhere in this or other OSCAL instances. The locally defined UUID of the mapping can be used to reference the data item locally or globally (e.g., in an imported OSCAL instance). This UUID should be assigned per-subject, which means it should be consistently used to identify the same mapping across revisions of the document.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:metadata.title: Document Metadata
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:metadata.description: Provides information about the containing document, and defines concepts that are shared across the document.

title.title: Document Title
title.description: A name given to the document, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

items.title: Revision History Entry
items.description: An entry in a sequential list of revisions to the containing document, expected to be in reverse chronological order (i.e. latest first).

title.title: Document Title
title.description: A name given to the document revision, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

items.title: Role
items.description: Defines a function, which might be assigned to a party in a specific situation.

id.title: Role Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for the role.

title.title: Role Title
title.description: A name given to the role, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

short-name.title: Role Short Name
short-name.description: A short common name, abbreviation, or acronym for the role.

description.title: Role Description
description.description: A summary of the role's purpose and associated responsibilities.

items.title: Location
items.description: A physical point of presence, which may be associated with people, organizations, or other concepts within the current or linked OSCAL document.

uuid.title: Location Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A unique ID for the location, for reference.

title.title: Location Title
title.description: A name given to the location, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

items.title: Location URL
items.description: The uniform resource locator (URL) for a web site or other resource associated with the location.

items.title: Party
items.description: An organization or person, which may be associated with roles or other concepts within the current or linked OSCAL document.

uuid.title: Party Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A unique identifier for the party.

type.title: Party Type
type.description: A category describing the kind of party the object describes.

name.title: Party Name
name.description: The full name of the party. This is typically the legal name associated with the party.

short-name.title: Party Short Name
short-name.description: A short common name, abbreviation, or acronym for the party.

items.title: Party External Identifier
items.description: An identifier for a person or organization using a designated scheme. e.g. an Open Researcher and Contributor ID (ORCID).

scheme.title: External Identifier Schema
scheme.description: Indicates the type of external identifier.

items.title: Organizational Affiliation
items.description: A reference to another party by UUID, typically an organization, that this subject is associated with.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:location-uu.title: Location Universally Unique Identifier Reference
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:location-uu.description: Reference to a location by UUID.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:party-uuid.title: Party Universally Unique Identifier Reference
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:party-uuid.description: Reference to a party by UUID.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:role-id.title: Role Identifier Reference
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:role-id.description: Reference to a role by UUID.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:back-matter.title: Back matter
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:back-matter.description: A collection of resources that may be referenced from within the OSCAL document instance.

items.title: Resource
items.description: A resource associated with content in the containing document instance. A resource may be directly included in the document using base64 encoding or may point to one or more equivalent internet resources.

uuid.title: Resource Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A unique identifier for a resource.

title.title: Resource Title
title.description: An optional name given to the resource, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

description.title: Resource Description
description.description: An optional short summary of the resource used to indicate the purpose of the resource.

citation.title: Citation
citation.description: An optional citation consisting of end note text using structured markup.

items.title: Resource link
items.description: A URL-based pointer to an external resource with an optional hash for verification and change detection.

href.title: Hypertext Reference
href.description: A resolvable URL pointing to the referenced resource.

media-type.title: Media Type
media-type.description: A label that indicates the nature of a resource, as a data serialization or format.

base64.title: Base64
base64.description: A resource encoded using the Base64 alphabet defined by RFC 2045.

filename.title: File Name
filename.description: Name of the file before it was encoded as Base64 to be embedded in a resource. This is the name that will be assigned to the file when the file is decoded.

media-type.title: Media Type
media-type.description: A label that indicates the nature of a resource, as a data serialization or format.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:property.title: Property
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:property.description: An attribute, characteristic, or quality of the containing object expressed as a namespace qualified name/value pair.

name.title: Property Name
name.description: A textual label, within a namespace, that uniquely identifies a specific attribute, characteristic, or quality of the property's containing object.

uuid.title: Property Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A unique identifier for a property.

ns.title: Property Namespace
ns.description: A namespace qualifying the property's name. This allows different organizations to associate distinct semantics with the same name.

value.title: Property Value
value.description: Indicates the value of the attribute, characteristic, or quality.

class.title: Property Class
class.description: A textual label that provides a sub-type or characterization of the property's name.

group.title: Property Group
group.description: An identifier for relating distinct sets of properties.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:link.title: Link
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:link.description: A reference to a local or remote resource, that has a specific relation to the containing object.

href.title: Hypertext Reference
href.description: A resolvable URL reference to a resource.

rel.title: Link Relation Type
rel.description: Describes the type of relationship provided by the link's hypertext reference. This can be an indicator of the link's purpose.

media-type.title: Media Type
media-type.description: A label that indicates the nature of a resource, as a data serialization or format.

resource-fragment.title: Resource Fragment
resource-fragment.description: In case where the href points to a back-matter/resource, this value will indicate the URI fragment to append to any rlink associated with the resource. This value MUST be URI encoded.

text.title: Link Text
text.description: A textual label to associate with the link, which may be used for presentation in a tool.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:responsible.title: Responsible Party
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:responsible.description: A reference to a set of persons and/or organizations that have responsibility for performing the referenced role in the context of the containing object.

role-id.title: Responsible Role
role-id.description: A reference to a role performed by a party.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:action.title: Action
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:action.description: An action applied by a role within a given party to the content.

uuid.title: Action Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A unique identifier that can be used to reference this defined action elsewhere in an OSCAL document. A UUID should be consistently used for a given location across revisions of the document.

date.title: Action Occurrence Date
date.description: The date and time when the action occurred.

type.title: Action Type
type.description: The type of action documented by the assembly, such as an approval.

system.title: Action Type System
system.description: Specifies the action type system used.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:responsible.title: Responsible Role
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:responsible.description: A reference to a role with responsibility for performing a function relative to the containing object, optionally associated with a set of persons and/or organizations that perform that role.

role-id.title: Responsible Role ID
role-id.description: A human-oriented identifier reference to a role performed.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:hash.title: Hash
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:hash.description: A representation of a cryptographic digest generated over a resource using a specified hash algorithm.

algorithm.title: Hash algorithm
algorithm.description: The digest method by which a hash is derived.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:remarks.title: Remarks
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:remarks.description: Additional commentary about the containing object.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:published.title: Publication Timestamp
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:published.description: The date and time the document was last made available.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:last-modifi.title: Last Modified Timestamp
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:last-modifi.description: The date and time the document was last stored for later retrieval.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:version.title: Document Version
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:version.description: Used to distinguish a specific revision of an OSCAL document from other previous and future versions.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:oscal-versi.title: OSCAL Version
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:oscal-versi.description: The OSCAL model version the document was authored against and will conform to as valid.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:email-addre.title: Email Address
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:email-addre.description: An email address as defined by RFC 5322 Section 3.4.1.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:telephone-n.title: Telephone Number
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:telephone-n.description: A telephone service number as defined by ITU-T E.164.

type.title: type flag
type.description: Indicates the type of phone number.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:address.title: Address
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:address.description: A postal address for the location.

city.title: City
city.description: City, town or geographical region for the mailing address.

state.title: State
state.description: State, province or analogous geographical region for a mailing address.

postal-code.title: Postal Code
postal-code.description: Postal or ZIP code for mailing address.

country.title: Country Code
country.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for the mailing address.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:addr-line.title: Address line
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:addr-line.description: A single line of an address.

oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:document-id.title: Document Identifier
oscal-mapping-oscal-metadata:document-id.description: A document identifier qualified by an identifier scheme.

scheme.title: Document Identification Scheme
scheme.description: Qualifies the kind of document identifier using a URI. If the scheme is not provided the value of the element will be interpreted as a string of characters.

oscal-mapping-oscal-mapping-common:map.title: Mapping Entry
oscal-mapping-oscal-mapping-common:map.description: A relationship-based mapping between a source and target set consisting of members (i.e., controls, control statements) from the respective source and target.

uuid.title: Mapping Entry Identifier
uuid.description: The unique identifier for the mapping entry.

relationship.title: Mapping Entry Relationship
relationship.description: The relationship type for the mapping entry, which describes the relationship between the effective requirements of the specified source and target sets.

ns.title: Relationship Value Namespace
ns.description: A namespace qualifying the relationship's value. This allows different organizations to associate distinct semantics for relationships with the same name.

oscal-mapping-oscal-mapping-common:mappi.title: Mapping Entry Item (source or target)
oscal-mapping-oscal-mapping-common:mappi.description: Identifies a specific edge within a source or target that is the subject of a mapping.

type.title: Subject Type
type.description: The semantic type of the subject.

id-ref.title: Subject Identifier Reference
id-ref.description: A reference to an identified subject that is of the specified type.

oscal-mapping-oscal-mapping-common:mappi.title: Mapped Resource Reference
oscal-mapping-oscal-mapping-common:mappi.description: A reference to a resource that is either the source or target of a mapping.

type.title: Resource Type
type.description: The semantic type of the resource.

href.title: Catalog or Profile Reference
href.description: A resolvable URL reference to the base catalog or profile that this profile is tailoring.

oscal-mapping-oscal-mapping-common:mappi.title: Mapping Provenance
oscal-mapping-oscal-mapping-common:mappi.description: Describes requirements, incompatibilities and gaps that are identified between a target and source in a mapping item.

method.title: Method
method.description: The method used to complete the overall mapping.

matching.title: Matching
matching.description: The method used for relating controls within the mapping.

oscal-mapping-oscal-mapping-common:quali.title: Relationship Qualifier
oscal-mapping-oscal-mapping-common:quali.description: Describes requirements, incompatibilities and gaps that are identified between a target and source in a mapping item.

predicate.title: Predicate
predicate.description: The predicate describes how the qualifer applies to the subject.

category.title: Category
category.description: The category expresses the resolvable nature of the predicate.

Base64Datatype.description: Binary data encoded using the Base 64 encoding algorithm as defined by RFC4648.

DateTimeWithTimezoneDatatype.description: A string representing a point in time with a required timezone.

EmailAddressDatatype.description: An email address string formatted according to RFC 6531.

StringDatatype.description:
A non-empty string with leading and trailing whitespace disallowed. Whitespace is: U+9, U+10, U+32 or [ 
	]+

TokenDatatype.description: A non-colonized name as defined by XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes Second Edition. https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema11-2/#NCName.

URIDatatype.description: A universal resource identifier (URI) formatted according to RFC3986.

URIReferenceDatatype.description: A URI Reference, either a URI or a relative-reference, formatted according to section 4.1 of RFC3986.

UUIDDatatype.description: A type 4 ('random' or 'pseudorandom') or type 5 UUID per RFC 4122.
